spec: iOS + Android + PWA: 1024x1024 master, plus exports (or allow us to generate exports).
Clean vector logo for crisp scaling across desktop/tablet/mobile.
Short MP4 loops for each category hero tile (placeholders in use).
CSV mapping video_id -> preferred thumbnail URL or timecode/frame note (move visible, face visible, minimal blur).
Per-business logo + optional theme overrides once multi-tenant goes live.
Set STRIPE_SECRET_KEY and STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SIGNING_SECRET in Netlify (never in code).
Optional: provide explicit business Starter + Pro monthly/annual price IDs so we can pin to exact prices. If omitted, server auto-discovers the first active price for the product + interval.
Confirm Customer Portal configuration includes the right products/prices for upgrade/downgrade & cancellation flows.
Project URL, Anon key, Service Role key; enable Email auth; confirm JWT expiry; confirm storage bucket plan for thumbnails (optional).
Personal access token with video read scopes to pull thumbnail images/timecodes. Do not store in repo; keep in local env.
